snippet: Andy Murray once tried to make his international team mate Liam Broady's life a misery by ensuring his first speech at a Davis Cup welcome dinner was a disaster....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray once tried to make his international team mate Liam Broady's life a misery by ensuring his first speech at a Davis Cup welcome dinner was a disaster.

headline.print_headline: Murray Plans Harsh New Initiation Ceremony for Broady
headline.main: Murray Plans Harsh New Initiation Ceremony for Broady
